## Why?

-   Econometricians search and reveal the **average causal effects of treatment**!

-   Average Treatment Effect (ATE) - true causal effect is the difference between potential outcomes:

$$
\text{ATE} = \text{potential outcome when treated} \\ - \text{potential outcome when not treated}
$$

. . .

Let us investigate the effect of the Conditional Cash Transfers on the children mean schooling in years in the household.
